poin_titel_1.poin: Vote directly using QRIS (Available only for certain events)

poin_titel_2.poin: Choose the event you want to vote for
Click 'View Finalist' to see all finalists
Select your favorite finalist and enter the number of votes you want
Fill in your personal details and choose your payment method, then click 'Confirm'
Complete your payment and don’t forget to click 'Check Payment Status' afterward
Congratulations, your vote has been successfully submitted!

poin_titel_3.poin: Open your preferred Mobile Banking app or e-wallet
Scan the QRIS of your favorite finalist
Enter the desired amount (Make sure you know the price of 1 vote)
Fill in your personal details and choose your payment method, then click 'Confirm'
Complete your payment and don’t forget to click 'Check Payment Status' afterward
Congratulations, your vote has been successfully submitted!

modal_faq.desc_titel_1: KREEN Vote is a voting platform where you can directly support your favorite finalists without limitations and with real-time updates.
modal_faq.sub_titel_2: How can I support my favorite finalist?

poin_titel_2.poin: Go to the voting page link provided by each event, or visit the kreen.id website to find the event you want. Then, you can easily and quickly vote for your favorite finalist.
You can also support your favorite finalist simply by scanning their personal QRIS code provided specifically for them.

modal_faq.sub_titel_3: How long does the voting last?
modal_faq.desc_titel_3: The voting duration depends on each event.
modal_faq.sub_titel_4: What if I fail to vote?
modal_faq.desc_titel_4: Make sure your internet connection is stable.
modal_faq.sub_titel_5: Is there a minimum or maximum number of votes?
modal_faq.desc_titel_5: No worries, you can support your favorite finalist with as many votes as you want. There is no minimum or maximum limit.
modal_faq.sub_titel_6: How do I know my vote has been counted?
modal_faq.desc_titel_6: Make sure you complete all the voting steps.
modal_faq.poin_titel_6_a: a. When voting via the website, don’t forget to click 'Check Payment Status' after making your payment. If successful, you will be redirected to the voting success page. After that, you can refresh or reload the voting page.
modal_faq.poin_titel_6_b: b. When scanning a finalist’s personal QRIS code, make sure you follow the process to completion. Then, refresh or reload the voting page.
modal_faq.sub_titel_7: What if I find that my vote was not counted?
modal_faq.desc_titel_7: Don’t panic. You can contact the Help Center listed on the voting page. Be sure to include the Name and Phone Number you used when voting. You must also provide proof of payment.
